text: Manoranjan Debbarma (Born 5 October 1962) is an Indian politician and member of the Communist Party of India (Marxist). He represented Mandaibazar (Vidhan Sabha constituency) of West Tripura district. Debbarma was a member of the Tripura Legislative Assembly from 1998 to 2018. ==See also== * Rashiram Debbarma * Radhacharan Debbarma * Jitendra Choudhury == References == Category:Communist Party of India (Marxist) politicians Category:Living people Category:Communist Party of India (Marxist) politicians from Tripura Category:Tripura politicians Category:1962 births Category:People from West Tripura district
title: Manoranjan Debbarma
